comments.author: Dragonbite
comments.body: I check their social networks to knwo more information about the project.https://medium.com/@safuvest/safuvest-the-new-global-realfi-platform-that-will-seamlessly-connect-crypto-holders-borrowers-775755c56753Here is information about project, what it offers and its advantages.A Trustless Credit Scoring System - I think will increase the trust to the project.

comments.body: Quote from: Dragonbite on July 07, 2022, 08:27:21 AMI check their social networks to knwo more information about the project.https://medium.com/@safuvest/safuvest-the-new-global-realfi-platform-that-will-seamlessly-connect-crypto-holders-borrowers-775755c56753Here is information about project, what it offers and its advantages.A Trustless Credit Scoring System - I think will increase the trust to the project.The most important for every project is to be useful for people. It is very important that people will trust the project and services it offers.

comments.author: federalmoney_official
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoArena_Official on July 07, 2022, 08:50:07 AMQuote from: Dragonbite on July 07, 2022, 08:27:21 AMI check their social networks to knwo more information about the project.https://medium.com/@safuvest/safuvest-the-new-global-realfi-platform-that-will-seamlessly-connect-crypto-holders-borrowers-775755c56753Here is information about project, what it offers and its advantages.A Trustless Credit Scoring System - I think will increase the trust to the project.The most important for every project is to be useful for people. It is very important that people will trust the project and services it offers.The most important is to create the project that is really necessary for people to be in demand.Now competition between cryptocurrency projects is so high that it is necessary to offer someting useful to be in demand for a long time.The most important it to trust the platfrom and its administration.

comments.author: DeFi Doge
comments.body: Quote from: federalmoney_official on July 08, 2022, 09:31:35 AMQuote from: Dragonbite on July 07, 2022, 08:27:21 AMI check their social networks to knwo more information about the project.https://medium.com/@safuvest/safuvest-the-new-global-realfi-platform-that-will-seamlessly-connect-crypto-holders-borrowers-775755c56753Here is information about project, what it offers and its advantages.A Trustless Credit Scoring System - I think will increase the trust to the project.The most important is to create the project that is really necessary for people to be in demand.Now competition between cryptocurrency projects is so high that it is necessary to offer someting useful to be in demand for a long time.The most important it to trust the platfrom and its administration.The fall of the market is very dangerous time for all cryptocurrency projects.Only the best projects will be able to survive during the fall of the market that are really necessary for people.

comments.body: Quote from: Dragonbite on July 09, 2022, 10:43:42 AMInformation from their twitterMeet Safuvest Chief Operating Officerhttps://medium.com/@safuvest/meet-safuvest-chief-operating-officer-4329f3f9303dMore information at https://twitter.com/SafuVest/status/1540976728872452096It is very important to know the team of the project to evaluate its potential.Team must have enough experience to realize all plan ideas and continue to develop a project in all conditions.
